level.text: A special ballot box inspection team shall perform the following functions for the ballots of each precinct and early voting center:
Open special ballot box containers and remove all ballot envelopes;
Separate all ballot envelopes into three (3) groups:
Absentee ballot envelopes which were delivered to a polling place on Election Day
Record the number of each type of ballot envelope for each precinct or early voting center.
Members of the special ballot box inspection team shall not open any ballot envelopes, but shall deliver them unopened to a representative designated by the Executive Director.
Special ballot envelopes gathered pursuant to this section shall be processed in conformity with ยง 807.
Curbside ballot envelopes gathered pursuant to this section shall be processed in conformity with ยง 806.
Absentee ballot envelopes gathered pursuant to this section shall be processed in conformity with ยง 808.
